POSTED ON BOTH XXSIN_RAIKOUXX AND THE SECOND LJ ACCOUNT. I'm so tired....so tired. It's around 6pm and I've had two hours sleep in the last 48 hours, I think. I just got home from the hospital where I'd taken Kelly. She's sick, extremely so. She's probably dying..Inside and out. She has AIDS, liver failure, gullstones, and also a severe chest infection as well as dementia which is a severe type of memory loss. She's on so many medications to try and keep her alive that it's likely she'll kill herself trying to do the opposite. I was really surprised when she asked for me to sit with her Wednesday after we went shopping for groceries. She had a bad headache, a migraine, and she'd never had one before. She told me she felt so scared because a member of our family had a bad migraine, hit the floor trying to get help and ended up choking on her vomit, slipping into a coma and never waking up. I guess she was afraid that would happen, considering she couldn't talk to begin with. When her headache started to lift, she talked and told me she hadn't wanted to face reality the last four or five years. And that she'd lost so much time with the people important to her and her own children because of sex, drugs, and alcohol. I don't know what to honestly think, but I know it's a possibility that I may end up being a parent/guardian, after all. An extremely good possibility. Kelly has very few family left that wants to directly help her; most just avoid the situation. Then again, I learned yesterday night my dad's been drinking and getting drunk again. He's reverting back to the times when he was a jerk. Mom told me today in the elevator, after I'd gone to get her from ICU, that he had accused her of spending all their money. So they're going broke. I may not have an internet for much longer considering I may not even have a job now. It's pretty much going to hell here and getting worse. Even Hell seems like a miniature paradise with the way things are going. I wish I had the guts to walk and out and leave everything behind, but I don't. I know if I left, when I came back I wouldn't have a family anymore. I'm getting caught up with everything here and I'm beginning to think I might lose myself somewhere down the line. I'm getting so ugly in nature lately, considering I cussed out two co-workers within a one week span. It's bothering me because I keep getting passes by this guys at work, and I don't want their attention. The friends I had online used to be my everything, but most of them have lives, and the others don't want me to begin with. Most of them don't even know half of me like they thought they did. I got a lot of blame for things. There's only one person on here who seems interested in what's going on in my life and I'm sorry that I'm breaking my promise to come and see Julie. I wanted to go to her graduation, but unfortunately, I'm sure that's not going to happen. NOTE: Due to being unable to see properly, I'll continue this on another post. Also, I'm going to post things about myself that none of you knew, maybe then you'll understand why Shi is Shi and no one else.
